name: @eherve/mongoose-update-to-pipeline
description: Transform plain update to pipeline update
author: Eric Herve <eric.herve.95@gmail.com>

scripts.test: docker run -p 4242:27017 --name mongoose-update-to-pipeline --rm -d mongo:8.0 && tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && c8 mocha -R spec dist/**.spec.js ; docker stop $(docker ps -a -f name=mongoose-update-to-pipeline -q)
scripts.docker: docker run -p 4242:27017 --name mongoose-update-to-pipeline --rm -d mongo:8.0 && tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && c8 mocha -R spec dist/**.spec.js
